{"inkVersion":21,"root":[[{"->":"intro"},["done",{"#f":5,"#n":"g-0"}],null],"done",{"intro":[["^This is the main elevator.","
","^It can get you literally anywhere, but it requires keycard access.","
","^Mine only allows for reaching the first floor.","
","^Which is already weird considering what I do.","
","ev","str","^Why are you risking your job for me?","/str","/ev",{"*":".^.c-0","flg":20},"ev","str","^Why do they limit your access so much?","/str","/ev",{"*":".^.c-1","flg":20},{"c-0":["
","^I don't know.","
","^I guess, I have nothing to lose.","
",{"->":"world"},{"#f":5}],"c-1":["
","^I mean, I am barely a receptionist","
","^I act more like decoration for positive PR.","
",{"->":"world"},{"#f":5}]}],{"#f":1}],"world":["^Look around you.","
","^You know how the world operates now.","
","^And this is the building where everything started.","
","^Anyway, press the elevator button, when you're ready.","
","end",{"#f":1}],"global decl":["ev","str","^tut","/str",{"VAR=":"speaker"},"/ev","end",null],"#f":1}],"listDefs":{}}
